name: UITextAutocapitalizationType
desc: The autocapitalization behavior of a text-based view.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Specifies that there is no automatic text capitalization.

items.name: case words
items.desc: Specifies automatic capitalization of the first letter of each word.

items.name: case sentences
items.desc: Specifies automatic capitalization of the first letter of each sentence.

items.name: case allCharacters
items.desc: Specifies automatic capitalization of all characters, such as for entry of two-character state abbreviations for the United States.
